Trade/Device Name(s): SD GlucoNFC Blood Glucose Monitoring System
SD GlucoNFC Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): SD GlucoNFC Multi Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SD GlucoNFC and GlucoNFC Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative measurement of blood glucose using electrochemical biosensor technology.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood (fingertip, palm, forearm, upper arm); single-user self-testing at home (SD GlucoNFC) and multi-patient use in professional healthcare settings including venous whole blood (SD GlucoNFC Multi); aids in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis or screening; not for neonates.
